titles: Great news from Lymerick in Ireland A full and true account of the state and siege of that city, by His Majesties forces, commanded by Count Solms, and Lieutenant General Douglas. With a particular relation of the surrendring of Cork and Yaughall, by the Irish.
publisher: Printed at London, and re-printed at Edinburgh,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Ireland.
keywords: Limerick (Limerick, Ireland) --  History --  Siege, 1690 --  Early works to 1800.
Ireland --  History --  War of 1689-1691 --  Early works to 1800.
